word:
Hannah,  Mother of Samuel
1 Samuel 1, 2
   HANNAH, FIRST AND BEST-LOVED WIFE OF ELKANAH, A LEVITE, WAS BARREN AND GREATLY DESIRED A CHILD. AT THE YEARLY FEAST AT SHILOH SHE SILENTLY CRIED AND PRAYED TO THE LORD TO GRANT HER A CHILD. ELI, THE PRIEST, HEARD HER AND TOLD HER TO "GO IN PEACE, AND MAY THE LORD, THE GOD OF ISRAEL, ANSWER YOUR PRAYER."
